mapper.insert: insert into article (ID, TITLE, PUB_DATE, LIKE_NUM, SCAN_NUM, ARTICLE_TYPE, CONTENT) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pubDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{likeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scanNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update article
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUB_DATE = #{pubDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LIKE_NUM = #{likeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SCAN_NUM = #{scanNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ARTICLE_TYPE = #{articleType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
